thread.title: Football: Furious Mourinho walks out of interview after Hull City draw
thread.title_full: Football: Furious Mourinho walks out of interview after Hull City draw

title: Football: Furious Mourinho walks out of interview after Hull City draw
text:
By Game Yetu Friday, February 3rd 2017 at 15:34 [PHOTO: COURTESY] 
Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has shown his frustration with his side's goalless Premier League draw with Hull City by walking out on a post-match interview. 
Clearly agitated by the draw, Jose Mourinho did not take it kindly to a question from a reporter as he stormed out of a television interview. 
The reporter who asked "what particularly did he think the referee should have pulled them up on?", Mourinho replied: "Well if you don't know football, you shouldn't have a microphone in your hand" before cutting the interview short and storming out.
